 2012-14472012-11-01,  ,  ,  NR, 
ActCanada Revenue Agency Act
PrecisAppointment of MARGARET MELHORN of Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, as a director of the Board of Management of the Canada Revenue Agency, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of John Firth.
